description: This file implements a platform-dependent utility function `SysCreateInfoRepositoryV2` to create and return a new Sys Info Repository object in a system environment. It primarily includes license headers, documentation, and a single function definition that calls an internal creation function.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysCreateInfoRepositoryV2(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates a new Sys Info Repository object, taking three context handles as arguments and returning a handle to the created object.
